alert.note: Alert for Ford; Iroquois; Kankakee; La Salle; Livingston (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 5:42AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Livingston, southern La Salle, southwestern Kankakee, north central Ford and northern Iroquois Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 541 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Minonk to Fairbury to Onarga. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Streator, Pontiac, Watseka, Dwight, Fairbury, Gilman, Herscher, Clifton, Milford, Chatsworth, Gridley, Onarga, Forrest, Flanagan, Wenona, Odell, South Streator, Piper City, Ashkum and Cullom. Including the following interstates... I-55 between mile markers 188 and 218. I-57 between mile markers 273 and 300. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for central, north central, northeastern and east central Illinois.

area.areaDesc: Ford; Iroquois; Kankakee; La Salle; Livingston
